title: not connecting
body: I had internet and everything yet i would try to reconnect over and over again and now I lost rp and am stuck in a leaver buster.

replies.body: It sucks to hear that the net cut out and resulted in a leave.  :(  It sounds like your network is having problems staying connected, so I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide if it's still happening.  Hopefully everything is okay now, and best of luck in your next match!
